languages.text: {n}Спустя день пути дым тлеющих пожаров остается далеко позади. Ветер пременился, а вместе с ним, пусть и едва заметно, изменились леса Кетца Темера. Тропа, по которой только что ступал{mf||а} Вольный Торговец, стала непроходимой стеной переплетенных лиан. Редчайшая аномалия местной флоросферы снова сыграла коварную шутку — лес изменился, ориентиры спутались, тропы переплелись меж собой.{/n}

{n}After a day's journey, the smoke of the smouldering fires has been left far behind. The wind has changed, and with it the forests of Quetza Temer, if only subtly. The path the Rogue Trader just followed has become an impassable wall of tangled vines. The rare anomaly of the local florosphere has once again played its insidious trick — the forest has changed, reference points have swapped positions, and paths have become intertwined.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя день пути дым тлеющих пожаров остается далеко позади. Ветер пременился, а вместе с ним, пусть и едва заметно, изменились леса Кетца Темера. Тропа, по которой только что ступал{mf||а} Вольный Торговец, стала непроходимой стеной переплетенных лиан. Редчайшая аномалия местной флоросферы снова сыграла коварную шутку — лес изменился, ориентиры спутались, тропы переплелись меж собой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这一天的行程结束之后，闷燃的火焰与黑烟被远远抛在了后面。风向变了，森林中的地形也发生了改变。尽管变化不大，但行商浪人刚刚踏过的小路，如今又变成了布满藤蔓、无法逾越的高墙。这座森林罕见的古怪现象再次挡住了行商浪人的脚步。森林本身发生了变化，原本的参考点也变换了位置，所有路径都交织在一起。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a day's journey, the smoke of the smouldering fires has been left far behind. The wind has changed, and with it the forests of Quetza Temer, if only subtly. The path the Rogue Trader just followed has become an impassable wall of tangled vines. The rare anomaly of the local florosphere has once again played its insidious trick — the forest has changed, reference points have swapped positions, and paths have become intertwined.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这一天的行程结束之后，闷燃的火焰与黑烟被远远抛在了后面。风向变了，森林中的地形也发生了改变。尽管变化不大，但行商浪人刚刚踏过的小路，如今又变成了布满藤蔓、无法逾越的高墙。这座森林罕见的古怪现象再次挡住了行商浪人的脚步。森林本身发生了变化，原本的参考点也变换了位置，所有路径都交织在一起。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une journée de voyage a suffi à faire disparaître les feux à l'horizon. Les vents ont changé, de même que les forêts de Quetza Temer, bien que plus subtilement. Le chemin emprunté par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est maintenant recouvert d'un mur infranchissable de plantes grimpantes. L'anomalie rare de la florosphère locale a de nouveau frappé : la forêt n'est plus la même, les points de référence ont changé de position, et les chemins se sont entremêlés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a day's journey, the smoke of the smouldering fires has been left far behind. The wind has changed, and with it the forests of Quetza Temer, if only subtly. The path the Rogue Trader just followed has become an impassable wall of tangled vines. The rare anomaly of the local florosphere has once again played its insidious trick — the forest has changed, reference points have swapped positions, and paths have become intertwined.{/n}

L'anomalie rare de la florosphère locale a de nouveau frappé : la forêt n'est plus la même, les points de référence ont changé de position, et les chemins se sont entremêlés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras un día de viaje, el humo de los incendios queda atrás. El viento ha cambiado, y con él los bosques de Quetza Temer, aunque el cambio sea sutil. El camino que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente acaba de recorrer es un muro de lianas enredadas intransitable. La anómala florosfera local ha vuelto a jugar una mala pasada: el bosque ha cambiado, los puntos de referencia están en otros lugares y los caminos se han retorcido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a day's journey, the smoke of the smouldering fires has been left far behind. The wind has changed, and with it the forests of Quetza Temer, if only subtly. The path the Rogue Trader just followed has become an impassable wall of tangled vines. The rare anomaly of the local florosphere has once again played its insidious trick — the forest has changed, reference points have swapped positions, and paths have become intertwined.{/n}

El camino que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente acaba de recorrer es un muro de lianas enredadas intransitable. La anómala florosfera local ha vuelto a jugar una mala pasada: el bosque ha cambiado, los puntos de referencia están en otros lugares y los caminos se han retorcido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一日の旅を終えると、燃え盛る炎の煙ははるか後方にある。風向きが変わり、それとともにケツァ・テメルの森も微かにではあるが変化した。自由開拓者が通って来た道は絡み合うツタでできた壁で通行不能になっていた。土地のフロロスフィアの珍奇な異常が再び陰湿ないたずらをほどこしたのだーー森は変化し、参照地点は入れ替わり、道は絡み合ってしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a day's journey, the smoke of the smouldering fires has been left far behind. The wind has changed, and with it the forests of Quetza Temer, if only subtly. The path the Rogue Trader just followed has become an impassable wall of tangled vines. The rare anomaly of the local florosphere has once again played its insidious trick — the forest has changed, reference points have swapped positions, and paths have become intertwined.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一日の旅を終えると、燃え盛る炎の煙ははるか後方にある。風向きが変わり、それとともにケツァ・テメルの森も微かにではあるが変化した。自由開拓者が通って来た道は絡み合うツタでできた壁で通行不能になっていた。土地のフロロスフィアの珍奇な異常が再び陰湿ないたずらをほどこしたのだーー森は変化し、参照地点は入れ替わり、道は絡み合ってしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Tagesreise liegt der Rauch der qualmenden Feuer weit, weit hinter {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Der Wind hat sich gedreht, und mit ihm haben sich auch die Wälder von Quetza Temer verändert, wenn auch nur auf subtile Weise. Der Weg, dem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} eben noch gefolgt ist, ist zu einer undurchdringlichen Wand aus wuchernden Pflanzen verkommen. Die seltene Anomalie der lokalen Florosphäre hat wieder ihr heimtückisches Kunststück vollführt: Der Wald hat sich verändert, Bezugspunkte haben die Position vertauscht, Wege haben sich gekreuzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a day's journey, the smoke of the smouldering fires has been left far behind. The wind has changed, and with it the forests of Quetza Temer, if only subtly. languages.text: {n}Bir günlük yolculuğun ardından için için yanan yangının dumanı, çok gerilerde kaldı. Rüzgâr yön değiştirdi ve Quetza Temer ormanları da kurnazca bile olsa değişime eşlik etti. Hür Tacir'in izlediği yol, iç içe geçmiş sarmaşıklardan geçit vermeyen bir duvara döndü. Yerel flora anomalisi, bir kez daha sinsi numarasını yaptı. Orman değişti, referans noktaları farklı konumlarda belirdi ve yollarsa birbirine dolandı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a day's journey, the smoke of the smouldering fires has been left far behind. The wind has changed, and with it the forests of Quetza Temer, if only subtly.
